channel.title: NPCHandler Drop Error. ***[Fixed]*** +++LOCK TOPIC PLEASE+++
channel.description:
[center][size=32pt]***[Fixed]***[/size][/center] [center][size=32pt]- Lock Topic Please -[/size][/center]
I added one drop code into the handler. And the drops into Item2. Everything is coded right, and I just wanted to test it with a whip drop.
What I added in NPCHandler: [code]if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 3200) { drop(Item2.randomDitems(), 1, NPCID); }[/code] Looked at all the rest of the drop codes, nothing is different from mine.
Item2: [code]public static int Ditems[] = {4151};[/code] Also in the right place, and looks like the rest.
Heres my compile error: [code]NPCHandler.java:613: cannot find symbol symbol : method randomDitems() location: class Item2 if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 3200) { drop(Item2.randomDitems(), 1, NPCID); } ^ Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 1 error Finished! Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
Help if you can :).
[Edit] I did test it, it didn't work.

if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 3200) { drop(Item2.randomDitems(), 1, NPCID); }

THIS IS NOT A SPAM POST ----ANTI SPAM ON[/quote]

Im looking at this and drawing a blank discribe more please? Which “;” should I take out?

item.title: NPCHandler Drop Error. ***[Fixed]*** +++LOCK TOPIC PLEASE+++
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Val Mod Val
item.description:
@Mod_Val wrote:

[center][size=32pt]***[Fixed]***[/size][/center]
[center][size=32pt]- Lock Topic Please -[/size][/center]

I added one drop code into the handler. And the drops into Item2. Everything is coded right, and I just wanted to test it with a whip drop.

What I added in NPCHandler:

if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 3200) { drop(Item2.randomDitems(), 1, NPCID); }

Looked at all the rest of the drop codes, nothing is different from mine.

Item2:

public static int Ditems[] = {4151};

Also in the right place, and looks like the rest.

Heres my compile error:

NPCHandler.java:613: cannot find symbol symbol : method randomDitems() location: class Item2 if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 3200) { drop(Item2.randomDitems(), 1, NPCID); } ^ Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 1 error Finished! Press any key to continue . . .

Help if you can :).

[Edit] I did test it, it didn’t work.

Read full topic
